ComicInfo.Title: The Warsaw Werewolf; Honey, I Stunk the Kids; Freddy Krocker Food Company; Come on - Enuff Awready!; Taking It Literally; Be Prepared!; Monster Kids; Snake Charmers; Random Funnies; The Warsaw Snake Charmer; Sign of the Times; Just Folks!; Drawing the Line; The Peace Treaty; Unknown Facts about the California Raisins; Ill-Legal Weapons; Cracked Guide to Customized Skateboards; Quasimodo at the Doctor's Office
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hudd and Dini disguise themselves as snake charmers but the guard hides in their snake basket.
A cobra whistles to make his owner dance.
ComicInfo.Letterer: Don Martin,John Severin,Michael Ricigliano,Henry Boltinoff,Gary Fields
